lemma lift_ptyping: "\<turnstile> p : T \<Rightarrow> \<Delta> \<Longrightarrow> \<turnstile> \<up>\<^sub>p n k p : \<up>\<^sub>\<tau> n k T \<Rightarrow> \<up>\<^sub>e n k \<Delta>" "\<turnstile> fps [:] fTs \<Rightarrow> \<Delta> \<Longrightarrow> \<turnstile> \<up>\<^sub>r\<^sub>p n k fps [:] \<up>\<^sub>r\<^sub>\<tau> n k fTs \<Rightarrow> \<up>\<^sub>e n k \<Delta>"
